title: DCP Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: There is a phone interview then an in person interview. They ask a series of questions to understand if you are trustworthy to work with children. The process was very smooth and I was introduced to people that would be my direct managers. Very in-depth process that allowed for an understanding what the job would entail.
Interview Questions: What would you do if a child punched you.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Phoenix, AZ)
Interview Descriptions: Very well organized and they were engaged. They were open to my own questions. They responded with professional responses. Interviewers were on time and allowed me to speak as long as necessary.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths in the field.

title: Medical Transportation Driver Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: The interview consists of them trying to convince you to take a dayhab position. When I asked them what about the position that I actually applied for, the response was well this is what we need.
Interview Questions: No questions the lady literally just talks the whole time.

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: After sending my resume and cover letter, the company communicated that they would be in touch to schedule an interview. However, later I received an email that the position was filled. I would have liked to know why I was overlooked but I guess most companies do not take effort to be honest and do that.
Interview Questions: Was misled that did not get an interview.

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: Was digital with about three people to four people. Ask basic questions but mostly about safety and therapy and how I planned to keep my sessions interesting when the kids get bored.
Interview Questions: How do you plan to include play or games into therapy.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (West Chester, PA) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: They asked me about my experience in behavioral health and had me write 6 short essay responses to 6 question scenarios related to case management. I had a first interview via phone screen, a second interview via zoom, 6 essay questions, and a 3 rd interview.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a difficult client or their family?

title: Direct Support Professional 2nd Year Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: They call you after they review your resume. They screen you for drugs and experience and you relate that to them. Then you receive reference and background checks and then you hope to clear them so you can start working right away.
Interview Questions: What are your previous experiences?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview that was concentrated on gaining knowledge of your experience. There was a comfortable conversation that allowed the exchange of information to be natural without the obvious list of questions.
Interview Questions: Why did you become a nurse?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: Initial call with company recruiter, then a 1-on-1 interview with the program manager I'd be working for. Laid-back and pretty informal, with typical interview questions. Afterwards had to submit references and information online, then do the Diana Screening.
Interview Questions: Types of evidence-based practices I was used to using, familiarity with electronic health records

title: UR Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (League City, TX)
Interview Descriptions: I was required to fill out a packet with short answer questions prior to my interview. After that, I sat in an interview with 2 individuals for approximately 45 minutes before having to complete a writing sample.
Interview Questions: What are your greatest weaknesses? Tell us about yourself. How do you handle multiple/conflicting priorities and deadlines?

title: Mental Health Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Easy and awesome interview process everyone was helpful and nice and everyone seemed to be helpful in the process. I enjoyed the interview process they also were quick to get back to me
Interview Questions: How I could contribute to company

title: Youth Services Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Denver, CO) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was simple, fast, direct. They were really interested in hiring immediately, so questions were directed towards availability and current ability. After the initial interview, I received a verbal offer, and continued through the process by taking different assessments and trainings.
Interview Questions: What do you know about de-escalation and grounding techniques?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Denver, CO) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interviewers asked a lot of tough questions and really got to the bottom of your knowledge and experience. I'd say this one needs some preparations.  Make sure that you have research done about the agency.
Interview Questions: What are your professional experiences?

title: Mental Health Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: This interview was very laid back and calm. I felt like i was given a fair chance. They asked me questions about myself and my job history and about what in life do I think will help me perform this job.
Interview Questions: Why I was interested in working at Devereux. What makes me feel like this job is right for me.

title: Revenue Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Phone screening with HR, formal interview director, second round of interviews one month later with hiring managers. All interviews were conducted over phone. After another month of follow ups I received a phone call from HR.
Interview Questions: What interests you in working here? Describe your past experience?

title: Direct Support Personnel Level II Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Upper Red Hook, NY) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: Via Zoom, lasted about an hour and a half. With the community Residence director and the ICF Manager.  Getting to know each other questions, the 15 very pointed questions to do directly with the job. Interview lasted an hour and half.
Interview Questions: Majority of questions were "what would you do, if this situation, or that situation occurred, what could I bring to the table  as far as group programming, crisis resolution, etc.

title: Quality Management Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was smooth. It included an HR phone screen and a 2nd interview with the hiring manager. The whole process took less than a month. A drug screen is reguired.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you worked on a team and not all members were on the same page.

title: Mental Health Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Viera, FL) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a piece of cake. No tough questions at all. Very simple questions requiring no intense thought. Interview was done over the phone due to Covid-19. Devereux is always needing people so you should pass the interview like it was nothing as long as you say something.
Interview Questions: Have you worked with kids before?

title: DSP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Somerset, NJ) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: Mostly behavioral questions. A lot of time too, took me about an hour or so. Great recruiters. You will hear back in a weeks time. May have to check on them for an update.
Interview Questions: Time when you were pressured

title: Recruiter Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was a phone screen. She asked me a lot of questions regarding my previous experience. She didn't leave me with any next steps but was very nice. After listening in, I read reviews and decided that the company was not a good fit for me.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience with working in a behavioral health environment

title: Mental Health Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Viera, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, phone interview was scheduled 2 weeks after. Interview was easy and interviewer was pleasant but I did not get the job though. Weekend shifts are necessary which was something I was unaware of when applying.
Interview Questions: What three characteristics make you a good role model for children?

title: Case Worker Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Saint Augustine, FL) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: Easily set up an in person interview after phone interview with HR. Very friendly staff. A little confusing on where exactly to meet for interview but place was small enough to find my way. Overall very good experience.
Interview Questions: What are signs of a child at risk?

title: Employment Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Berwyn, PA)
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by four people. They were all friendly, and made me feel comfortable. I was asked about myself and then asked questions that were pretty standard interview questions and not very difficult. I was then then told that the second part of the interview was a written portion. I was emailed questions to send back to the hiring manager by Monday (I was interviewed on Friday). The questions were all scenarios.
Interview Questions: where do you see yourself in the future?

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Kennesaw, GA) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is in a group. I did not have time to stay for the interview so I had a conversation with the woman that would be my direct boss and was given an offer.
Interview Questions: They mostly ask about prior experience.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Tampa, FL) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview was conducted with the director. They asked about my current job position, why I was leaving. You will be asked to write a documentation based on a prompt of a parent's visitation.
Interview Questions: What's an area you struggle with?

title: DCP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Viera, FL) in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was honestly very quick and easy. You have to go to Orlando to do a drug test and fingerprints but other then that everything was easy
Interview Questions: Have you ever had experience caring for other individuals

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Philadelphia, PA) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was quite straight forward and not too difficult.  Very easy hiring process and very friendly and helpful people. Did not stress too much about this interview and it went very well.
Interview Questions: What would you do inn a situation where an individual was asking somethign outside the job description?

title: Special Education Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Rutland, MA)
Interview Descriptions:
Apply via school spring.
 I got a phone call and I was invited for an on-site interview. 
A week after the onsite interview, I was asked to do a sample lesson.
Interview Questions: How will you utilize paraprofessionals? What do you know about Devereux?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Phoenix, AZ)
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward; usual interview questions. Begins with a phone screen and then depending on the position may require several interviews.  Because Devereux is a behavioral health organization, you are required to take a drug test and have a background check.  It is helpful if you have a fingerprint card prior to your interview, otherwise, you will need to get one when you are hired.  Interviewing tip--do your homework and find out more about Devereux;   it will be helpful in your interview.
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to work for the organization.

title: Mental Health Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Denver, CO)
Interview Descriptions: I applied and they got back to me within a week. I did have to fly out for an interview and they did not compensate. The interview was really straight forward, it took 30 mins and then I did an observation. The observation was REALLY helpful in seeing what the position actually entailed, it was helpful talking to people working in the position I’d applied for. I accepted the position, I’m not expecting glitz and glory but I think this will be an awesome stepping stone after graduating undergrad to get hands on work with patients and to gain tons of experience. They’re not offering me a lot in terms of pay so i don’t plan on staying for more than 2 years.
Interview Questions: A lot of hypothetical questions about patient care and how I’d react in certain scenarios

title: Direct Support Professional (DSP) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Berwyn, PA) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: it was breif straight to the point. Interviewer asked a few behavioral scenario questions.  Interviewer also asked a few questions about my resume. The interview did not last no more than 30 minutes.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you handled a conflict.

title: Outpatient Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Tampa, FL) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions:
What are your strengths?
What are your weaknesses?
Where do you see yourself in five years? Ten years?
Why do you want to leave your current company?

What can you offer us that someone else can not?
What are three things your former manager would like you to improve on?
Are you willing to relocate?
Interview Questions: How do you manage multiple responsibilities?

title: Behavior Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Tucson, AZ) in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: I first applied online, got a call a week later for an interview. If you have worked behavioral health before, the questions they ask are easy. The only problem I had is I applied full time and they called and offered me the job a week later but said they only had an on call available. If so then why have me submit an application saying full time but offer me on call?
Interview Questions: Describe a time you used boundaries with clients?

title: Assistant Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Goleta, CA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted two days after they received my application, my interview was the following Friday and it's been two weeks (they said they would get back to me by now) and I haven't heard anything. I have emailed them and haven't received a response.
Interview Questions: What are your experiences with working with people with disabilities?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Scottsdale, AZ)
Interview Descriptions: I applied online. I called a few days later to inquire about the progress of my application and was immediately given a phone interview. Two hours later, I was asked for come in the following week for an in-person interview. I had my interview with a coordinator and lead clinician. They took turns asking me questions about my education and experience as a clinician.
Interview Questions: What's your therapeutic orientation?

title: Assistant Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: The interviewers themselves we're really great and seemed like they loved their jobs. The job was very mosrepresented. It was presented as a management position but was really just direct care with very little organization for the program itself. it seemed more like they were selling me the position.
Interview Questions: The questions were nondescript.

title: THS Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: I only had 1 interview; easy ; quick response with hiring offer; 2 people present during interview; The company was moving offices. The HR was quick with checking my reference.
Interview Questions: work experience; Case load; why I left my pervious job; foster care experience

title: Many Roles Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Pittsburgh, PA)
Interview Descriptions:
I applied online for several different jobs at this company. One supervisor called me a month later to interview me for one of the jobs that I applied for. After that it took several weeks before I heard back from the supervisor. I didn't get the job and I don't know why. I have lots of experience working with individuals with disabilities. I was offered one job at a low low pay. I declined the job offer because of the low pay.
I gave up applying to jobs in this company because I lost hope that they won't hire me. I kept getting rejection from this company
Interview Questions: How do you handle stress?

title: Direct Care Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Westminster, CO) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: Asks what you would do in different situations.  Explain that restraints will be used on kiddos.  Drug test is a mouth swab (believe thats a 24-hour check).  Tell you about their campus and include an observation with you observing a unit before deciding to accept job offer.  Does not show the culture of working longer than your shift time.
Interview Questions: What are my strengths and weaknesses.

title: Mental Health Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very quick response to job application, quick phone screen to assure this is a job you are interested and booked an immediate zoom interview call the next day! Interview questions are as expected, reasoning behind wanting this specific job, great skills you believe you possess that will benefit you in this field etc.
Interview Questions: 3 Best skills you possess that will benefit you in this specific job?

title: Mental Health Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: fast quick and in a hurry. I didn't even finish my application online (I completed half of it) before someone called to schedule an interview.  I came in twice before starting training. overall, pretty quick process because they are in need of more employees since that job has such a high turnover rate
Interview Questions: What experience do you have?

title: Residential Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Broomfield, CO) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: I submitted my resume online and was contacted for an interview within a few days. The first interview is one on one. Then you are invited back for a one hour observation and peer interview (unpaid). Afternoon and evening shifts for full time is 36 hours. Overnights are 40 hours. I received a call within a couple of days with an offer. It's 14.50 per hour whether you have a college degree or not. The person I was shadowing told me she had her nose broken by a client a few weeks ago. $14.50 is not enough for all the residential counselors have to deal with.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work with children?

title: DCP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: around 1.2 hrs, two or three interviewers will pull up a packet that is filled with questions and scenarios. Some are ranking most valued qualities to a child's treatment, how would you handle emergency situations, how would you communicate with team members, etc. Pretty much they would write notes as you answer
Interview Questions: how would you handle emergency scenarios

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Hillsborough, NJ) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Lots of back and forth calling and emailing to set up interviews. Starts with a phone interview which is just a basic screening. If the hiring recruiter sees you fit for the job they will schedule you for an in person interview at one of the group homes (depending on the location you applied for). If the in person interview goes well, the paper work you fill out will be sent to the hiring office. They will do a back ground check and call references. If all checks out they call with an offer.
Interview Questions: "describe a time where you witnessed something illegal or unethical and what did you do?"

title: Mental Health Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Westminster, CO) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Applied online through Devereux Careers page on their website.  Was promptly notified of the acceptance of my application and received a follow-up email a few days later to schedule a phone conversation.  After completing the conversation I was invited in for an interview that day.
Interview Questions: The interviewer asked a lot of scenario questions. What would you do in this situation?

title: Program Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Glenmoore, PA) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview was great and extremely beneficial. I see a lot of possibilities with this company. They provided an excellent insight into the company structure, how they service the children and more.
Interview Questions: What are my strong suits

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Glassboro, NJ) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interviewing process consisted of me being interviewed by one woman in an office at a desk. The interview lasted for 10-15 minutes before they hired me right on the spot.
Interview Questions: Describe a scenario where you had to work under pressure.

title: Direct Care Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Westminster, CO) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and received an email back a couple of days later asking me a few questions about why I was interested in the position.  After this, I had a 10-minute phone screening that mostly involved HR telling me more about the position and giving me an opportunity to ask questions. I was called back for an in-person interview the following week, which lasted about 20 minutes and was a typical one-on-one interview. After this interview, they had me complete a 2-hour observation on one of the units to see how I interacted with the kids and to give me a preview of what the job would be like. They then completed a reference check, a background check, and a drug test and offered me the position the following week.
Interview Questions: Situational question about how you would deal with a difficult client

title: Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Scottsdale, AZ) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview was straight forward and casual, the questions came from a prewritten packet. Neither of the interviewers were overly formal or serious, and explained their agency in depth when I asked questions about it. They directly talked to me about pay afterwards, so I had a pretty good idea they would offer me the position. There were a few different interruptions during the process.
Interview Questions: What have you done in a crisis situation?

title: Program Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process seemed a little over the top. I had two interviews that lasted over 30 minutes each and I'm still not sure if I got the job.
Interview Questions: They asked numerous situational questions about how I would handle certain situations and  what kind of management style I thought I had.

title: Direct Care Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Westminster, CO)
Interview Descriptions: First, there was a phone interview that lasted 20 minutes. Second, was an in person interview that last around 40 minutes. Mine was with the director of the department, but some individuals interviewed with supervisors. Lastly, you have to complete an hour and 45 minute observation.
Interview Questions: A client had a fight with their boyfriend/girlfriend and, as they were discussing the argument, they asked if you had a boyfriend/girlfriend. How would you respond?

title: Child Welfare Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Tampa, FL) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: It's the same as any other behavoiral health interview. Same questions, they just want to know about your previous experience or education. How you deal with external and internal conflict? The job requires heavy time management and they notified me up front what the job would consist of.
Interview Questions: They want to know how well you work with others.

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Goleta, CA)
Interview Descriptions: I went during one of their open house interviews.  I filled out a questionnaire, and when I was interviewed, they briefly read my answers and asked me a few questions based on my answers.
Interview Questions: There are many parts of this job that aren't so pretty (eg, cleaning up bodily excrement, being hit by clients).  Would you be able to deal with this? How?

title: Direct Care Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Orlando, FL) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions:
The interview was very long. It felt like if you was going to be hired for an FBI position.
Also the new staff participated on an online interactive conference where you got to meet some of the staff from other states and a welcoming team once you was hired. A very expensive set up for just a direct care job. The job tasks were never described properly during the interview
Interview Questions: Have you ever taking finger prints before for a job?

title: Information Systems Support Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: They sent me an email to setup a phone interview and then never called at the appointed time, never heard from them.  Not a good way to win over potential candidates.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: HR director called to set up the interview and I met with the hiring manager. Not a lot of questions for me. Mostly trying to sell me on the agency.
Interview Questions: What is the structure of your company’s leadership?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: The first interview is with the clinical manager. The second interview is with the clinical manager, the lead clinician, and therapists from the clinical department. During the second interview everyone gets to question to you. If you are called in for a second interview, you are either one of 2 or one of 3 candidates.
Interview Questions: Numerous therapeutic questions.

title: Residential Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Denver, CO)
Interview Descriptions: I was first contacted by HR for a phone interview, which lasted about 30 minutes.  They then emailed me a few days later asking me to come in for a second, formal interview. The second interview lasted 2-3 hours with the time split between the interview and shadowing. The questions were mostly behavioral/situational questions. Explaining how you would handle a potential situation, etc. The shadowing involved me going to a unit (they ask what group you are most interested in, I said behavioral disorders) and spending some time there with the residents and their counselors. The shadowing itself was very beneficial, it gave great insight to what I would be doing every day. Things were very hectic. My largest complaint was that the counselors (my potential coworkers) were unfriendly and unwelcoming. Only one of them acknowledged my presence. That, along with the very unsafe environment, is why I did not take the job.
Interview Questions: What would you do if a resident started yelling and throwing things?

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Berwyn, PA) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: Very quick, they seem to hire anyone who has a high school diploma and driver's license. It took them only twenty minutes to tell me I was hired. Which is both good and bad.
Interview Questions: Basic questions like can you cook, do you have a driver's license, what would you do if an individual is aggressive with you

title: Behavior Health Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Malvern, PA)
Interview Descriptions: Long drawn out process. Phone interview then in person  interview. Person who was supposed to interview me didn't even show up so a random person had to do the interview. I waited almost am hour before I was interviewed.
Interview Questions: Situational questions

title: Human Resources Support Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Orlando, FL) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by a Mgr. and he asked me a couple of questions and scheduled me for an interview. When I came in for this interview, the first thing I noticed was how miserable the receptionist looked. Then she told me to use the phone and dial the HR Mgr. myself. I thought this was the receptionist's job? During the interview, the a Mgr. and some other woman (she did not even tell me what her role was) interviewed me by asking canned questions from a list and writing down my responses. This interview did not last long. The whole thing felt impersonal. And I was told I would be working in a cubicle with no windows and constant noise and distractions all around. Sorry, but not my type of work environment. The office was hot as hell too. Hope someone else enjoys working in that environment for $13 an hour.
Interview Questions: How would you handle working in a cubicle with distractions all around? Tell us about a time you used initiative.

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and recieved a phone call about a totally different position. I needed another job so I decided to try. I Came in , took drug test and just got asked about my morals and ethics.What would I do in different scenarios. They ask for references and will not offer until atleast three respond. Inerview isin an ioen roomwith windows so everyone can see you and distract you. People were walking through room aswell during the interview. Very unprofessional. The interviewer however was sweet, Ms.MR.
Interview Questions: If I had any experience.

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Westminster, CO)
Interview Descriptions: first there was a basic phone screening with a member of human resources department. Then the manager called for an in person interview with the department manager and another manager within  the company. Both took turns asking questions.
Interview Questions: how I handle stressful situations

title: Direct Support Professional (DSP) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Berwyn, PA) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: the interview process went by fast, i met with the manager, i believe. she was positive and understanding. the location was at hankin. the questions were practical too and she told me how i did instantly
Interview Questions: tell me about a time you had to work without a supervisor and what did you do?

title: Intensive Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health
Interview Descriptions: applied through the internal website. HR contacted me to let me know they received my application. Regional manager of the office i applied to contacted me within a week asking me to come in for an interview.

Then after all state and federal background/child abuse clearances have been received you must go in for another interview (usually about two weeks later) and they do not communicate with you to update you on that last interview. Then at the last interview they do an oral swab drug test and give you papers to go get fingerprinted and get a physical and get your clearances again. Finally about 1-2 weeks after that then they offer you the job.

title: Medical Records Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Devereux Advanced Behavioral Health (Devon, PA) in Nov 2010
Interview Descriptions:
I found the position listed on a job search website on the internet. I sent my application through online on the Devereux website. An HR representative called me a few days later and  conducted a telephone initial screening interview. She said she would pass my information to the hiring manager. If he wanted to interview me, the HR rep would call me back. The following day (Friday), HR called me and set up and interview with the hiring manager for Monday.

I arrived on time to the location and needed to fill out a bunch of paperwork before the interview. Then I was led to the manager's office. I was nervous but after a few minutes I was comfortable with my interviewer. He seemed like a pleasant, upbeat type of personality and very bright. The interview progressed more like a conversation than stiff, pointed questions being thrown at me. I didn't feel as if he wanted to trip me up as other interviews I've had. I felt  that I had discussed and brought up everything I had wanted to address and he didn't seem to have anything left unasked. I was told that I was the last candidate being interviewed and I would hear something within a week.

Two days later on Wednesday I received a call from HR offering me the job which of course I accepted.
Interview Questions: I think the most difficult question that I got was to describe an incident where I had a conflict with a previous boss, where I was right and they were wrong and then how I handled it.
